name: startup_name
label: Startup Name
tip: The official name of the startup being analyzed.

name: sector
label: Sector
tip: The primary industry sector in which the startup operates.

name: subsector
label: Subsector
tip: A more specific industry category within the main sector.

name: funding_stage
label: Funding Stage
tip: Current stage of funding (e.g., Seed, Series A, Series B, etc.).

name: market_geography
label: Market Geography
tip: The geographic regions or countries the startup targets or serves.

name: country
label: Country
tip: The country where the startup is headquartered or primarily operates.

name: website
label: Website
tip: The official website URL for the startup.

name: founding_year
label: Founding Year
tip: The year the startup was founded.

name: industry
label: Industry
tip: The specific industry vertical relevant to the startup's product or service.

name: has_data_moat
label: Has Data Moat
tip: Indicates if the startup has proprietary data that creates a defensible competitive advantage.

name: prior_startup_experience_count
label: Prior Startup Experience Count
tip: Number of previous startups founded by the current founding team.

name: runway_months
label: Runway (Months)
tip: The number of months the startup can operate at current burn rate before needing new funding.

name: tam_size_usd
label: TAM Size (USD)
tip: Total Addressable Market size, representing the maximum revenue opportunity in USD.

name: regulatory_risk_score
label: Regulatory Risk Score
tip: A score indicating the level of regulatory risk faced by the startup in its market.

name: market_growth_rate_percent
label: Market Growth Rate (%)
tip: Annual growth rate of the startup's target market, expressed as a percentage.

name: conversion_rate_percent
label: Conversion Rate (%)
tip: Percentage of leads or users that convert to paying customers.

name: board_advisor_experience_score
label: Board Advisor Experience Score
tip: A quantitative assessment of the experience and value-add of the startup's board and advisors.

name: tech_differentiation_score
label: Tech Differentiation Score
tip: A score reflecting how unique and defensible the startup's technology is compared to competitors.

name: regulatory_advantage_present
label: Regulatory Advantage Present
tip: Indicates if the startup benefits from favorable regulatory conditions or barriers.

name: scalability_score
label: Scalability Score
tip: A score reflecting the startup's ability to scale operations efficiently.

name: cac_payback_months
label: CAC Payback (Months)
tip: The number of months it takes to recover the cost of acquiring a customer (Customer Acquisition Cost).

name: viral_coefficient
label: Viral Coefficient
tip: The number of new users generated by each existing user, indicating organic growth potential.

name: cash_on_hand_usd
label: Cash on Hand (USD)
tip: The amount of cash and cash equivalents currently held by the startup.

name: brand_strength_score
label: Brand Strength Score
tip: A score indicating the perceived strength and recognition of the startup's brand.

name: distribution_partner_count
label: Distribution Partner Count
tip: Number of partners or channels used to distribute the startup's product or service.

name: ltv_cac_ratio
label: LTV/CAC Ratio
tip: The ratio of customer Lifetime Value (LTV) to Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC), indicating unit economics.

name: sales_cycle_length_days
label: Sales Cycle (Days)
tip: The average number of days it takes to close a sale from initial contact to deal completion.

name: team_size_total
label: Team Size (Total)
tip: Total number of employees (full-time and part-time) at the startup.

name: founder_domain_experience_years
label: Founder Domain Experience (Years)
tip: Years of relevant industry/domain experience held by the founders.

name: has_debt
label: Has Debt
tip: Indicates whether the startup currently has any outstanding debt obligations.

name: debt_ratio
label: Debt Ratio
tip: The ratio of total debt to total assets, reflecting leverage.

name: team_diversity_percent
label: Team Diversity (%)
tip: Percentage of team members from diverse backgrounds (gender, ethnicity, etc.).

name: current_mrr
label: Current MRR
tip: Current Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR) generated by the startup.

name: team_engagement_score
label: Team Engagement Score
tip: A score indicating how engaged and motivated the team is (e.g., based on surveys or KPIs).

name: customer_churn_rate_percent
label: Customer Churn Rate (%)
tip: Percentage of customers lost over a specific period. High churn can signal product or market issues.

name: net_profit_margin_percent
label: Net Profit Margin (%)
tip: Net profit as a percentage of total revenue, indicating profitability.

name: founding_team_size
label: Founding Team Size
tip: Number of individuals in the original founding team.

name: gross_margin_percent
label: Gross Margin (%)
tip: Gross profit as a percentage of revenue, reflecting core business efficiency.

name: sam_size_usd
label: SAM Size (USD)
tip: Serviceable Available Market size, representing the portion of TAM targeted by the startup's products/services.

name: product_stage
label: Product Stage
tip: The current development stage of the product (e.g., MVP, Beta, Launched).

name: burn_multiple
label: Burn Multiple
tip: A ratio of net cash burned to net new ARR (Annual Recurring Revenue) added. Lower is better.

name: data_source
label: Data Source
tip: The origin or provider of the data used for analysis.

name: total_capital_raised_usd
label: Total Capital Raised (USD)
tip: Total amount of capital raised by the startup to date, in USD.

name: user_growth_rate_percent
label: User Growth Rate (%)
tip: The rate at which the user base is growing, expressed as a percentage.

name: nps_score
label: NPS Score
tip: Net Promoter Score (NPS) is a customer loyalty and satisfaction measurement taken from asking customers how likely they are to recommend your product or service to others.

name: complementary_skills_index
label: Complementary Skills Index
tip: A quantitative measure of how well the founding team’s skills complement each other (e.g., technical, business, product, sales).

name: revenue_growth_rate
label: Revenue Growth Rate
tip: The percentage rate at which the startup’s revenue is increasing month-over-month or year-over-year.

name: employee_turnover_rate_percent
label: Employee Turnover Rate (%)
tip: The percentage of employees who leave the company over a specific period, indicating retention and culture health.

name: competition_intensity
label: Competition Intensity
tip: A measure of how many competitors are in the space and the intensity of competition the startup faces.

name: network_effects_present
label: Network Effects Present
tip: Indicates whether the product or service benefits from network effects (i.e., becomes more valuable as more people use it).

name: market_adoption_stage
label: Market Adoption Stage
tip: The stage at which the target market is in adopting the product (e.g., Early Adopters, Early Majority, Late Majority).

name: switching_cost_score
label: Switching Cost Score
tip: A score (e.g., 1-10) reflecting how difficult it is for customers to switch to a competitor’s product or service.

name: key_person_dependency
label: Key Person Dependency
tip: A measure of how dependent the business is on a single key individual (founder, CTO, etc.). High dependency is a risk.

name: patent_count
label: Patent Count
tip: The number of patents granted or pending that are owned by the startup.

name: product_uptime_percent
label: Product Uptime (%)
tip: The percentage of time the product or service is operational and available to customers.

name: security_compliance
label: Security Compliance
tip: A description of the startup’s compliance with security standards and certifications (e.g., SOC 2, ISO 27001).

name: customer_concentration_percent
label: Customer Concentration (%)
tip: The percentage of revenue coming from the largest customer(s). High concentration can indicate risk.

name: prior_successful_exits_count
label: Prior Successful Exits Count
tip: Number of successful startup exits (acquisitions or IPOs) achieved by the founding team.

name: annual_revenue_run_rate
label: Annual Revenue Run Rate
tip: Projected annual revenue based on current monthly or quarterly figures.

name: burn_rate_usd
label: Burn Rate (USD)
tip: The amount of money the startup is spending (net loss) per month.

name: waitlist_size
label: Waitlist Size
tip: Number of users or customers on a waitlist for the product or service.

name: has_network_effect
label: Has Network Effect
tip: Indicates if the startup’s product or business model benefits from network effects.

name: switching_cost
label: Switching Cost
tip: A description of the costs or barriers a customer faces when switching to a competitor.

name: product_retention_30d
label: 30-Day Retention (%)
tip: The percentage of users who remain active 30 days after signup.

name: product_retention_90d
label: 90-Day Retention (%)
tip: The percentage of users who remain active 90 days after signup.

name: mau
label: Monthly Active Users
tip: The total number of unique users who engage with the product or service in a given month.

name: nps
label: NPS
tip: Net Promoter Score (NPS) is a customer loyalty and satisfaction metric based on customer survey responses.

name: moat_barriers
label: Moat Barriers
tip: Types of barriers that protect the startup’s business model (e.g., patents, network effects, regulatory, brand).

name: linkedin_connections_total
label: LinkedIn Connections
tip: Total number of LinkedIn connections among the founding team, indicating professional network reach.

name: twitter_followers_total
label: Twitter Followers
tip: Total number of Twitter followers for the startup or founders, indicating social media influence.

name: domain_expertise_years_avg
label: Domain Expertise (Years)
tip: Average years of relevant industry/domain expertise among the founding team.

name: gender_diversity_index
label: Gender Diversity Index
tip: A composite index measuring gender diversity within the team (e.g., 0 = no diversity, 1 = fully balanced).

name: geography_diversity_index
label: Geography Diversity Index
tip: A composite index measuring the geographic diversity of the team.

name: founders_count
label: Founders Count
tip: Total number of founders in the startup.

name: previous_exits_count
label: Previous Exits Count
tip: Number of previous successful exits by the founding team.

name: patents_count
label: Patents Count
tip: Total number of patents held by the startup.

name: has_patents
label: Has Patents
tip: Indicates if the startup owns any patents.

name: monthly_burn_usd
label: Monthly Burn (USD)
tip: The amount of cash the startup spends per month.

name: total_funding_usd
label: Total Funding (USD)
tip: Total amount of funding the startup has raised to date.

name: revenue_annual_usd
label: Annual Revenue (USD)
tip: The startup's total revenue in the most recent fiscal year.

name: ltv_usd
label: Lifetime Value (USD)
tip: The average total revenue expected from a customer over their relationship with the startup.

name: regulation_flags
label: Regulation Flags
tip: Key regulatory requirements or risks relevant to the startup's market.

name: top3_competitor_share_pct
label: Top-3 Competitor Share (%)
tip: Percentage of market share held by the top three competitors.

name: roles_present
label: Roles Present
tip: Key roles present in the startup's team (e.g., CEO, CTO, CMO).

name: competitors_named_count
label: Competitors Named Count
tip: Number of direct competitors identified by name.

name: tam_justification
label: TAM Justification
tip: Explanation or evidence supporting the TAM estimate.

name: industry_regulation_level
label: Industry Regulation Level
tip: The degree of regulatory oversight in the startup's industry.

name: claimed_tam_usd
label: Claimed TAM (USD)
tip: The startup's stated estimate of their Total Addressable Market.

name: claimed_cagr_pct
label: Claimed CAGR (%)
tip: Compound Annual Growth Rate claimed by the startup for their market.

name: burn_stddev_usd
label: Burn StdDev (USD)
tip: Standard deviation of monthly burn, indicating volatility in cash outflows.

name: funding_rounds_count
label: Funding Rounds Count
tip: Total number of funding rounds completed by the startup.

name: committed_funding_usd
label: Committed Funding (USD)
tip: Funding that has been committed but not yet received.

name: years_experience_avg
label: Avg Years Experience
tip: Average years of professional experience among team members.

name: team_size_full_time
label: Team Size (Full-Time)
tip: Number of full-time employees at the startup.

name: degree_level_mode
label: Degree Level Mode
tip: The most common degree level among team members (e.g., Bachelor's, Master's, PhD).

name: cac_usd
label: CAC (USD)
tip: Customer Acquisition Cost — the average cost to acquire a new customer.

name: previous_exit_max_value_usd
label: Prev Exit Max Value (USD)
tip: The highest exit value achieved by any founder in previous ventures.

name: startup_id
label: Startup Id
tip: Data for startup id

name: success_label
label: Success Label
tip: Data for success label

name: round_valuation_usd
label: Round Valuation Usd
tip: Data for round valuation usd

name: post_money_valuation_usd
label: Post Money Valuation Usd
tip: Data for post money valuation usd

name: revenue_growth_rate_percent
label: Revenue Growth Rate Percent
tip: Data for revenue growth rate percent

name: investor_tier_primary
label: Investor Tier Primary
tip: Data for investor tier primary

name: customer_count
label: Customer Count
tip: Data for customer count

name: net_dollar_retention_percent
label: Net Dollar Retention Percent
tip: Data for net dollar retention percent

name: regulation_flags_json
label: Regulation Flags Json
tip: Data for regulation flags json

name: countries_served_json
label: Countries Served Json
tip: Data for countries served json

name: advisors_count
label: Advisors Count
tip: Data for advisors count
